entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
